attributes.action: Get the Royal Mail to make stamps for every UK soldier killed in the Iraq war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steve McQueen the official artist for the Iraq war wants the Royal Mail to make stamps of 160 soldiers killed in Iraq. Nearly all the families who have experienced loss have agreed to participate. The Royal Mail has not; with reasons for refusing to publish: it would set a precedent; it is too soon; it might upset people to see a mark made by the Post Office frank over an image of a soldier's face.
what rubbish, shame on you Royal Mail
